org.fishwife.jrugged

Class CircuitBreakerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fishwife.jrugged.CircuitBreakerFactory

  • public class CircuitBreakerFactory
extends Object
    Factory to create new CircuitBreaker instances and keep track of them.

    • Method Detail

      • createCircuitBreaker

        public CircuitBreaker createCircuitBreaker(String name,
                                           CircuitBreakerConfig config)
        Create a new CircuitBreaker and map it to the provided name. If the CircuitBreaker already exists, then the existing instance is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the CircuitBreaker
        config - the CircuitBreakerConfig with the configuration values.
        Returns:
        the created CircuitBreaker

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(Properties properties)
        Set the Properties object to search for CircuitBreaker property override values. The override values can be specified as:
        circuit.{circuit_name}.limit
        circuit.{circuit_name}.resetmillis
        circuit.{circuit_name}.windowmillis
        Parameters:
        properties - the Properties object to search.

      • findCircuitBreaker

        public CircuitBreaker findCircuitBreaker(String name)
        Find an existing CircuitBreaker
        Parameters:
        name - the value for the CircuitBreaker
        Returns:
        the found CircuitBreaker, or null if it is not found.

      • getCircuitBreakerNames

        public Set<String> getCircuitBreakerNames()
        Get the Set of created CircuitBreaker names.
        Returns:
        the Set of names.

      • configureCircuitBreaker

        protected void configureCircuitBreaker(String name,
                                       CircuitBreaker circuit,
                                       CircuitBreakerConfig config)

      • addCircuitBreakerToMap

        protected void addCircuitBreakerToMap(String name,
                                      CircuitBreaker circuitBreaker)
        Add a CircuitBreaker to the map.
        Parameters:
        name - the name for the CircuitBreaker
        circuitBreaker - the CircuitBreaker to add.
